overview:
Gerry is the founder of community driven cycling project Bicycle Basecamp. Fuelled by a passion for cycling Gerry formed Bicycle Basecamp May 2011.

As of February 2012 Bicycle Basecamp has a social reach of over 15,000 people per month through tumblr, Facebook, Blogspot and Twitter.

January 2012 Bicycle Basecamp formed an official partnership with UK charity Re-Cycle, aiming to raise awareness and money for their good cause. In partnership with London based bicycle store The Bicycle Man, Bicycle Basecamp designed the exclusive Foffa x Bicycle Basecamp “speedster” Road bike. A percent from every sale goes to Re-Cycle and represents one of many ways Bicycle Basecamp engages brands in the Re-Cycle mission.

September 2012 Bicycle Basecamp’s name will change to Cyclr.
